dct_title_s: Oil & gas map of the eastern Mediterranean / designed, produced, and distributed by the Petroleum Economist Ltd. ; in association with Eni ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush (Title panel)
dct_description_sm: Relief and depths shown by shading. Shows oil and gas fields, oil and bio refineries, tanker terminals, oil and gas storage, oil and gas pipelines, export plants, and import terminals. Ancillary maps: Egypt: offshore concession areas in Nile Delta Basin -- Cyprus: offshore concession areas -- Greece: concession areas -- Lebanon: offshore concession areas -- Israel: offshore concession areas -- Albania & Montenegro: offshore concession areas. Includes 6 graphs: Oil and gas proved reserves, production and consumption.
